curam.util.common.message

Class CustomMessageLocalizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.util.common.message.CatalogMessageLocalizer
      • curam.util.common.message.CustomMessageLocalizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageLocalizer, java.io.Serializable

    public class CustomMessageLocalizer
extends CatalogMessageLocalizer
    A message localizer for custom messages. The message to be localized should implement CustomMessage so that the catalog details can be retrieved from the message itself.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CustomMessageLocalizer()
      Creates a new localizer for a packed message.
      CustomMessageLocalizer(java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
      Creates a new localizer for a packed message.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LocalizedMessage localizeMessage(Message message, java.util.Locale locale)
      Localizes a message by extracting the message catalog and message identifier details from the message argument, which should be a CustomMessage.

      • Methods inherited from class curam.util.common.message.CatalogMessageLocalizer

        getCatalog, getCatalogName, getClassLoader, getFallbackLocale, getMessage, getMessage, setCatalogName, setClassLoader

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CustomMessageLocalizer

        public CustomMessageLocalizer()
        Creates a new localizer for a packed message. The details of the catalog used to retrieve the message string are contained within the message passed to CustomMessageLocalizer.localizeMessage(Message, Locale).

      • CustomMessageLocalizer

        public CustomMessageLocalizer(java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
        Creates a new localizer for a packed message. The details of the catalog used to retrieve the message string are contained within the message passed to CustomMessageLocalizer.localizeMessage(Message, Locale).
        Parameters:
        classLoader - The class loader to use when loading the catalog. May be null.

    • Method Detail

      • localizeMessage

        public LocalizedMessage localizeMessage(Message message,
                                        java.util.Locale locale)
                                 throws MessageException
        Localizes a message by extracting the message catalog and message identifier details from the message argument, which should be a CustomMessage.
        Specified by:
        localizeMessage in interface MessageLocalizer
        Overrides:
        localizeMessage in class CatalogMessageLocalizer
        Parameters:
        message - A CustomMessage object.
        locale - The locale required.
        Returns:
        The localized message.
        Throws:
        MessageException - If the message type is incorrect or if the catalog look-up fails.
        See Also:
        MessageLocalizer.localizeMessage(curam.util.common.message.Message, java.util.Locale)
